amendment.description: To modify the debt limit instruction for the House of Representatives and the Senate.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1760 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 5 - 94. Record Vote Number: 179.

action.text: Amendment SA 1760 proposed by Senator Paul to Amendment SA 1717.
